text:
How is it possible that Cindy Crawford looks as good now as she did in her 20s? (Dare we say she might even look better?) To attempt to steal some of that glow, we spoke to the world-renowned supermodel about her beauty routine. Fresh off of the launch of a few new additions to her own skin-care line, Meaningful Beauty, Crawford swears that it all starts with a proper anti-aging routine. (Cindy, we’ll believe anything you say.) From bespoke perfumes to drugstore mascaras, Cindy spills her beauty favorites.

RELATED: 7 Products That Help You on Your Way to Blake Lively’s Effortless Beach Waves
title: Her Favorite $8 Mascara and 5 Other Beauty Products Cindy Crawford Swears By

meta_data.title: $8 Drugstore Mascara, and 5 Other Beauty Products Cindy Crawford Swears By - PureWow
